verses.roman:
gadayābhihato 'py ājau
na cacāla yadūdvahaḥ
kṛṣṇo 'pi tam ahan gurvyā
kaumodakyā stanāntare

synonyms: gadayā—by the club; abhihataḥ—hit; api—although; ājau—on the battlefield; na cacāla—did not move; yadu-udvahaḥ—the deliverer of the Yadus; kṛṣṇaḥ—Lord Kṛṣṇa; api—and; tam—him, Dantavakra; ahan—struck; gurvyā—heavy; kaumodakyā—with His club, named Kaumodakī; stana-antare—in the middle of his chest.
translation: Although hit by Dantavakra's club, Lord Kṛṣṇa, the deliverer of the Yadus, did not budge from His place on the battlefield. Rather, with His massive Kaumodakī club the Lord struck Dantavakra in the middle of his chest.
